contest-event.event-date:
May 13, 2018 D Buxton Festival (Championship/First Section)
Buxton Festival (Championship/First Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Buxton Festival buxton-festival-championship
Pavilion Gardens, Buxton The 2018 Buxton festival has been cancelled due to ongoing work to the Octagon Theatre. Last years grand marquee was removed before the theatre was safe to open. It is hoped that the 2019 Festival will continue as usual. ( NWABBA web page http://www.northwestbrassbands.org.uk/news.asp )
Feb. 8, 2018, 10:01 a.m. June 16, 2018, 2:34 p.m.
